entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
